Travelling to Lund
The nearest airport is Copenhagen. From there you take the train directly to Lund.
We recommend a hotel in the city center of Lund.

title: Risk and Uncertainty Conference, Lund 2024
text:
The University building from 1882



Date & Venue
11-12 June 2024
Lund University, Sweden


Description
The 4th Risk and Uncertainty Conference (RUC) will bring together world-leading scholars on risk and uncertainty communication and is scheduled to take place between June 11-12th 2024 in Lund, Sweden.
RUC 2024 will be hosted by Lund University Centre for Environmental and Climate Science, together with the Department of Philosophy and Medical Ethics at Lund University, in collaboration with King’s Centre for Risk Management, Department of Geography, King’s College London.
The overarching theme this year is evidence and ethics in uncertainty communication, judgment, and decision-making


Registration
The number of participants is limited.
Registration opens in March. There will be a conference fee (TBD)
You can sign up your interest to be notified when registration opens on the abstract submission page.


Call for abstracts
We are now accepting abstract submissions for oral talks or posters. We welcome diverse submissions across domains, including health, safety, politics, security, the environment, and climate change as long as the research has clear policy-implications.
Submit your abstract before February 28th 2024!
